item.title: [ 47] PLEASE ATLEAST ATTEMPT TO NOT BE A MINDLESS RETARD AND READ THE PRIOR THREADS OP, I WANT ANSWERS
item.description:
Continuation Thread >>709229503
I feel like there was almost decent discussion occuring in this thread. I dont know if any of the good contributers are still here but i want to respond lightly to some stuff
>>709233421
>Imitators focus on the trappings of the overwhelming cosmos, but sputter to come up with any meaning, and pinpoint everything back on familiar tropes. E33 brings everything back to trauma and grief instead of digging deeper through trauma and grief toward a universal foundation.
while i dont share your same respect of lynch (admittedly have on watched twin peaks) This is the impression I get of the stories from reading reviews. I keep asling "okay...so another piece of media...thats says grief and trauma sucks and makes people emotional...so what? whats the actual point? what is it uniquely revealing about grief or trauma?" but since i haven't played the game and dont want to attract the type of retards that will use any excuse to not engage with the point of an argument by saying "YOU DIDNT EVEN PLAY/WATCH" Ill make this about a broader annoying trend of modern storytelling, where people are completely content to simply "depict" something rather than encapsulate something.
These type of shows and games where the point is so blatant and clear, and yet nothing is understood in the end, because the story is internally validating.
If anybody wants an elaboration of what i mean specifically just mention so in a reply, i dont want to run out of space so im stopping here.

Original filename: 1744903787224724.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [146] New Doom Details
item.description:
22 Missions Total
- 9 hours for the first 10 missions
- Biggest enemy variety of any Doom
- 9-12 unique weapons
- One codex collectible per level
- Big focus on story in cutscenes
- Chaingun turret sections where you defend a point
- Doom Slayer moves slower, feels powerful like a tank
- Smooth 60FPS performance with raytracing
- Supports DualSense haptics
- Missions are much bigger and can be longer than most Doom Eternal and 2016 missions.
- Gameplay wise it has to be one of the most innovative FPS games I've ever played.
- The shield saw is utilized well and can be used for most of the genuine glory kills. It's also reminiscent of the meathook from Doom Eternal in the form of a far destructive dash.
- Melee and parrying is very important, whether it's used with shields or melee
- fun and never repetitive or boring. - Rocket launcher can be used as a grenade launcher now, and the plasma rifle can be used with one or two barrels. The nail gun can also be automatic or as a sniper
-Mech gameplay makes you feel like godzilla in a city, you're able to smash through buildings and destroy toy sized tanks in the way.
- Combat with titans also utilizes the parry system with melee aside from the chaingun you receive to take them on from a distance.
- Dragon gameplay is very versatile and allows you to hop on and off in certain sections as well as perform special glory kills after some "bullet" parry combos with titans and ships.
- Cutscenes contain a much better written script than previous titles and are much more serious and gritty.
- Definitely game of the year material. -Puts Doom 2016 in third place, Doom Eternal in second place, and the Dark Ages in first.

Original filename: IMG_0123.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 60] Viv could've had a more interesting story if she portrayed her demons in Helluv
item.description:
Viv could've had a more interesting story if she portrayed her demons in Helluva Boss existing under an oppressive culture that rewards cruelty and cynicism while discouraging sincere affection and love resulting in many hellborn quickly melting in response to genuine empathy like viltrumites. It would have even fit her liberal ideals of fighting against oppressive power structures. I find it notable and odd then that her characters not only rub elbows with those in power so often but that said authority figures are portrayed so sympathetically and benevolently. We still see shades of her wanting to portray Blitzo as a "working class hero" but the narrative she set up is (unsurprisingly) schizophrenic and directionless.
Also Stolas is a shit.

Original filename: nword.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [190] /pcbg/ - PC Building General
item.description:
>UPGRADE & BUILD ADVICE
Post build list or current specs including MONITOR: https://pcpartpicker.com/
Provide specific use cases (e.g. 4K editing, high FPS gaming)
State budget and COUNTRY or you will not be helped

NEWS
>RTX 5060, RX 9060 XT, and Arc B770 expected with Computex

>12VHPWR
If a 12VHPWR connector is not fully seated in its socket, the connection can melt.
Do not use aftermarket cables or adapters.

>Intel Raptor Lake / RPL Refresh
Instability reported with 13th and 14th gen, i5 K SKUs and above (incl non-K). Update BIOS and apply Intel Baseline settings. Avoid purchases.

>CPUS
HTPC(4K60)/Web Browsing: i3 12100T
Gaming: R5 9600X; budget: i5 13400; eXtreme: R7 7800X3D
Multicore: Ultra 7 265K; budget: Ultra 5 235; destitute: i5 13400
>Avoid iGPU-less CPUs
>Existing AM4 board with an old chip? Consider a Zen 3 CPU

>GRAPHICS CARDS (@MSRP)
1080p: RTX 3060 12 GB / RTX 4060; ultra budget: used RTX 2060 Super
1440p: RTX 5070; RT: RTX 5070 Ti
2160p: RTX 5080; budget: RTX 5070 Ti
RX 9070 XT: reasonable if at least 33% cheaper than an RTX 5070 Ti or close to price of RTX 5070
Amateur production: RTX 3060 12GB, RTX 5060 Ti 16GB, used RTX 3090, used RTX 4090, RTX 5090

>RAM
DDR4: Zen3/AM4 - 2x 16GB 3600 MT/s CL18; for locked "non-K" 12th/13th/LGA1700 - 2x 16GB 3200 MT/s CL16
DDR5: Zen4/AM5 - 2x 16GB 6000 MT/s CL30; for Core Ultra/LGA1851 - 2x 16GB 6400MT/s CL32

>COOLERS
Thermaltake Phantom Spirit (or variant), Thermaltake Frozen Prism

>PSUS
A new PSU should be ATX 3.1 compliant
Aim for 50-75% PSU utilization at full system load
https://hwbusters.com/best_picks/best-atxv3-pcie5-ready-psus-picks-hardware-busters/

>SSDS
WD SN5000 2 TB, Samsung 990 Pro 2 TB
Avoid: cheapest NVMe SSDs
https://ssd.borecraft.com/

>MOTHERBOARDS
Good power delivery is required for Intel CPUs like the i5 13600K and above
Generally don't pair a K CPU with a B mobo chipset

>GAMING MONITORS
AOC Q27G3XMN, MSI MPG 321URX
https://pcpartpicker.com/user/pcbg/saved/dP3v4D

Prev: >>105195453

Original filename: Screenshot_2021-03-26 ZeptoBars.png

item.title: [ 54] USA still safe?
item.description:
This is not a thinly veiled bait thread. I and two friends all from Germany had been planning and saved up to visit Boston and NYC next year to visit a friend and then do a road trip to the West Coast. Also, to see the world cup. These friends have now cancelled all plans because they are scared to get send to a gulag in El Salvador. I am still debating to do a short trip by myself because I really want to see my friend in Boston. I do have interacted with some accounts on social media that report critically on your greatest ally, which might be a problem. Is it safe to travel to the US?

Original filename: 1242.jpg

item.title: [ 59] /tpg/ /rcg/ - Theme Park & Roller Coaster General
item.description:
Disneyland Abu Dhabi Edition

>Last Thread: >>2779327

>What is this thread? Why are there two companies?
Disney parks were initially founded as a way to celebrate the culture and history of America and provide middle class families with a fun-filled immersive experience. While theme parks are the main focus of these threads (and the title of the general) there is also discussion on other roller coasters & rides, as well as the parks themselves and trip planning too. That's where /rcg/ comes in.
>Can I talk about Disney/Universal parks in this thread?
Absolutely! Disney and Universal are currently competing for the Orlando theme park market and beyond! Universal is opening new resorts all around the US and new continents!

Thread Pro Tip: Talk about theme parks!

Park Crowd Tracker:
>https://queue-times.com/en-US/parks

https://disneyparksblog.com/disney-experiences/disney-announces-abu-dhabi-theme-park/
Epic Universe officially opens in two weeks, but previews are showing heavy operational issues
https://wdwnt.com/2025/05/breaking-harry-potter-and-the-battle-at-the-ministry-to-temporarily-close-during-final-week-of-epic-universe-previews/
And your local theme parks are probably open for weekends now

item.title: [199] /fglt/ - Friendly GNU/Linux Thread
item.description:
Users of all levels are welcome to ask questions about GNU/Linux and share their experiences.

*** Please be civil, notice the "Friendly" in every Friendly GNU/Linux Thread ***

Before asking for help, please check our list of resources.

If you would like to try out GNU/Linux you can do one of the following:
0) Install a GNU/Linux distribution of your choice in a Virtual Machine.
1) Use a live image and to boot directly into the GNU/Linux distribution without installing anything.
2) Dual boot the GNU/Linux distribution of your choice along with Windows or macOS.
3) Go balls deep and replace everything with GNU/Linux.

Resources: Please spend at least a minute to check a web search engine with your question.
Many free software projects have active mailing lists.

$ man %command%
$ info %command%
$ %command% -h/--help
$ help %builtin/keyword%

Don't know what to look for?
$ apropos %something%

Check the Wikis (most troubleshoots work for all distros):
https://wiki.archlinux.org
https://wiki.gentoo.org

/g/'s Wiki on GNU/Linux:
https://igwiki.lyci.de/wiki/Category:GNU/Linux

>What distro should I choose?
https://igwiki.lyci.de/wiki/Babbies_First_Linux
>What are some cool programs?
https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/list_of_applications
https://directory.fsf.org/wiki/Main_Page
https://suckless.org/rocks/
>What are some cool terminal commands?
https://www.commandlinefu.com/commands/browse
https://cheat.sh/
>Where can I learn the command line?
https://mywiki.wooledge.org/BashGuide
https://www.grymoire.com/Unix/
https://overthewire.org/wargames/bandit
>Where can I learn more about Free Software?
https://www.gnu.org/philosophy/philosophy.html
>How to break out of the botnet?
https://prism-break.org/en/categories/gnu-linux

/fglt/'s website:
https://fglt.nl

GNU/Linux Games:
>>>/t/1175569
>>>/vg/lgg

IRC: #sqt on Rizon
https://fglt.nl/irc.html

item.title: [170] /dmp/ - Digital Music Production
item.description:
>Wikis
https://dmpdoc.neocities.org/
https://mu-sic-production.fandom.com/wiki//mu/sic_Production_Wiki

>/g/ makes a 15th album
Theme: Trackers only
Title: Tracker Resurgance [sic]
Deadline: 10th of May, 11:00 UTC
Listening party: 11th of May, 20:00 UTC
Submissions for this theme must include a tracker file in addition to audio.
The following tracker formats are allowed: .xm, .mod, .it, as well as formats that chiptune trackers export to, such as lsdj
>Check out these trackers to get started
https://milkytracker.org/
https://openmpt.org/
https://github.com/tildearrow/furnace

Next album: Shitposting fundamentals volume 2

>IMPORTANT! READ THIS BEFORE SUBMITTING:
Upload the file somewhere, preferably in a lossless format, and post the link here. If you want to update your track, make a new post.
Include the song title in the post, and make it clear that your song is a submission for the album.
Optionally you may include cover art for your track, but please state that the image attached is the cover art or it won't be included. Artist names won't be included.
Songs that contain anything against YouTube's policies won't be uploaded on YT, but will still be added to the album.
All tracks will be normalised to -14 LUFS in the release. If your song has a lot of dynamic range and you want to keep it, just say so in the submission.

>Where can I hear the previous albums?
https://rentry.org/dmpalbums

Previous: >>105076341

item.title: [160] Trump lies with another big fat lie
item.description:
Trump continues his regressive propaganda campaign with more lies about foreign government deals, using excuses paid for by billionaires
https://www.motherjones.com/politics/2025/05/trump-org-foreign-real-estate-deals-unconstitutional-business-ethics-conflict-interest/
Trump Promised No New Business Deals With Foreign Governments. He Lied.
His family’s real estate deals put the president in direct conflict with the Constitution.

released an “ethics agreement” detailing how he would handle his personal business interests while in the White House. It is remarkably weak and does not require Trump to divest any of his holdings. Unlike a similar agreement for his first term, it does not prohibit the Trump Organization from striking new deals abroad while Trump is president. Instead, it simply prohibits the Trump Organization from striking deals directly with foreign governments.

Trump’s second-term ethics agreement is such a permissive document that it is challenging to find a way to violate it. But three months into his presidency, Trump has found a way.

Last Thursday, the Trump Organization struck a deal to build a $5.5 billion Trump International Golf Club in Qatar. To develop the project, the Trump Organization is partnering with Dar Global, a Saudi Arabian company, and Qatari Diar, a company owned by the Qatari government. Qatari Diar was established by Qatar’s sovereign wealth fund in 2005. Its stated purpose is to “coordinate the country’s real estate development priorities.”

Original filename: Trump-Excuses-58b8dc005f9b58af5c8f8e91.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 33] Despair
item.description:
Hey, I had something on my mind and figured some anons here would understand and have thoughts to share about it. I'm an ecologist and have worked in conservation for years; it's hard not to think about the decline of life on Earth that has only quickened in the last hundred years or so. I try to focus on preserving the fragments that remain, but recent events have just made it clear that technological advances will come for everything eventually, and anything that remains will be decimated. These thoughts plague me both in my work and leisure; I find it increasingly difficult to live in this world and every attempt to make peace with it feels so fake. Do y'all ever feel this way? What's the cope? Responses from other ecology professionals are especially appreciated, for the sake of realism.

Original filename: 1729768712472815.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [121] Pizza is American.
item.description:
The original pizza was ONLY known in Naples, not even in all of Italy. If you asked for pizza to someone from Rome, Venice, Sicily, Milan, Turin, Genoa, Florence or Bologna, they wouldn't what were you even talking about.
It was a small flat bread that fits in your hand with some oil and tomato sauce on top. It wasn't a culinary delicacy Neapolitan grandmas made, it was a cheap street food that working class men would consume just to eat something. Not that popular in Naples either.
It was Neapolitan immigrants who came to New York who made what we know as pizza now. When they arrive to New York, because they had more money and could afford more, started making pizzas bigger to the point that it had to be divided in slices for one to eat and started adding more ingredients to make it more savory like cheese, slices of pepperoni, onions, peppers, various meats and veggies; then started experimenting more with pizza when more Italians migrated to other cities.
When this happened around the late 1800s and early 1900s in the USA, Italy still didn't know what a pizza was overall, it was still the small pathetic flat bread with some tomato sauce on and olive oil on top. It was all the way until the 1980s where pizza started growing as a staple food in Italy, thanks to tourists asking for pizza and American pizza brands arriving there. Eventually starting evolving into their own way. But it is important to note that it was because of the USA.
The pizza we all know and love IS American, not Italian. Pizza IS American. It evolved in the USA, became a thing in the USA and got popular worldwide because of the USA.
Pizza is American.

Original filename: crisp-pepperoni.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 34] Hey voyagers, The sticky probably needs to be updated, I'll keep the thread
item.description:
Hey voyagers,

The sticky probably needs to be updated, I'll keep the thread open for suggestions:

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

/trv/ is a slow board, so don't expect immediate responses. CHECK THE CATALOG – you might find threads already discussing topics you're interested in.

Before asking for suggestions, tell /trv/ about your:
>Budget
>Interests
>Level of understanding of the local language(s)
This makes it easier to give quality advice. Of course, keep your posts travel related.

For all other matters:
General culture questions >>>/int/
Politics discussion >>>/pol/
Transportation discussion >>>/n/
Outdoors-related discussion >>>/out/

For more information about safety, planning and other miscellaneous topics, check out the pastebin:

GENERAL INFO:
https://pastebin.com/yR1SAr3s

Note: Discussions of prostitution or sex tourism are not permitted on /trv/.

Original filename: trv.png
